subScenes.name: 询问邮件状态
subScenes.description: 礼貌询问对方是否已发送项目进度邮件

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, did you get a chance to send the project update email?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，你有空发项目更新邮件了吗？

responses.text: I haven't sent it yet—I'm still finalizing the numbers.
responses.text_cn: 我还没发，正在最后核对数据。

responses.text: Just sent it a minute ago! Check your inbox.
responses.text_cn: 刚发了，去邮箱看看。

responses.text: Not yet, but I'll send it by noon.
responses.text_cn: 还没，中午前发。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用非正式语气拉近距离，适合同级同事

qaPairs.speakerText: Just checking in—was the email to the client sent?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 顺口问下，给客户的邮件发了吗？

responses.text: I'm still waiting on Sarah's input—I'll send it after her review.
responses.text_cn: 等Sarah反馈，她审完我就发。

responses.text: Yes, it went out this morning with the attachment.
responses.text_cn: 发了，今天早上带附件发的。

responses.text: Not yet, but I'm on it now.
responses.text_cn: 还没，我马上处理。

qaPairs.usageNote: 正式场合用‘checking in’更得体

subScenes.name: 解释延迟原因
subScenes.description: 礼貌说明邮件延迟发送的合理原因

qaPairs.speakerText: Sorry I haven't sent the report—my laptop crashed last night.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 抱歉没发报告，我昨晚电脑崩了。

responses.text: No worries—just resend it when you can. We've got time.
responses.text_cn: 没事，有空重发就行，还来得及。

responses.text: Oh no! Did you lose any data? Let me know if you need help.
responses.text_cn: 天啊！数据丢了吗？需要帮忙吗？

responses.text: Understood. Send it by EOD.
responses.text_cn: 明白，今天下班前发一下。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用‘No worries’缓解对方压力，适合非正式场景

qaPairs.speakerText: I apologize for the delay—the client changed the requirements again.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 很抱歉延迟了，客户又改了需求。

responses.text: That's understandable. Please update me once it's sent.
responses.text_cn: 能理解，发了记得告诉我一声。

responses.text: Again? Can I help you restructure the report?
responses.text_cn: 又改？要我帮你重排结构吗？

responses.text: Please prioritize this—CC me when done.
responses.text_cn: 请优先处理，发完抄送我。

qaPairs.usageNote: 正式回应需体现支持与跟进意识

subScenes.name: 提出替代方案
subScenes.description: 因附件问题提供其他发送方式或格式

qaPairs.speakerText: The PDF file is too big to send—can I share it via Google Drive instead?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: PDF太大发不了，能改用Google Drive吗？

responses.text: Sure! Just send me the link and set it to 'Anyone with link can view'.
responses.text_cn: 可以，发链接，设成‘任何人可查看’。

responses.text: I prefer email attachments for security—can you compress it?
responses.text_cn: 为安全起见，还是邮件附件，能压缩吗？

responses.text: Go ahead—link's fine.
responses.text_cn: 发链接吧，没问题。

qaPairs.usageNote: 提供方案时，主动说明权限设置更专业

qaPairs.speakerText: I can't open the .xlsx file—it says it's corrupted. Any chance you can resend as .csv?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 打不开xlsx文件，提示损坏，能重发成csv吗？

responses.text: I'll resend it as CSV right away—thanks for flagging this!
responses.text_cn: 马上重发CSV，谢谢提醒！

responses.text: Try opening it in Google Sheets—it might work there.
responses.text_cn: 试试用Google Sheets打开，可能能读。

responses.text: Done. CSV attached. Let me know if it works.
responses.text_cn: 好了，已附CSV，有事告诉我。

qaPairs.usageNote: 先解决再确认，避免重复沟通

subScenes.name: 确认抄送与格式
subScenes.description: 确认邮件抄送对象和附件格式是否正确

qaPairs.speakerText: Just sent the update—CC'd Linda and Mark, right?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 刚发了更新，抄送了Linda和Mark对吧？

responses.text: Yes, but please also add Priya—she needs the data for the meeting.
responses.text_cn: 对，但别忘了加Priya，她要开会用数据。

responses.text: Mark's out this week—remove him and CC his assistant instead.
responses.text_cn: Mark这周不在，换成他助理。

responses.text: Got it, added Priya.
responses.text_cn: 收到，已加Priya。

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认抄送时，直接指出需增删人员更高效

qaPairs.speakerText: The attachment is in .docx—should I convert it to PDF for consistency?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 附件是.docx格式，要转成PDF统一格式吗？

responses.text: Yes, please—our templates are all PDF now.
responses.text_cn: 要的，现在模板都统一用PDF。

responses.text: No need—docx is fine if they're editing it.
responses.text_cn: 不用，他们要修改的话docx更方便。

responses.text: Converted and resent as PDF.
responses.text_cn: 已转PDF，重发了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 说明格式选择依据，减少后续争议

subScenes.name: 结束沟通
subScenes.description: 礼貌收尾并确认后续跟进方式

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, I've sent everything—let me know if you need anything else.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好了，都发了，有需要随时说。

responses.text: Thanks! I'll review it by tomorrow and get back to you.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢，我明天看完再回复你。

responses.text: Appreciate it! Have a great afternoon.
responses.text_cn: 太感谢了，祝你下午愉快！

responses.text: Got it.
responses.text_cn: 收到。

qaPairs.usageNote: 简短回应适合快节奏办公场景

qaPairs.speakerText: Just confirming—we're all set on the email? No changes needed?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 确认一下，邮件没问题了吧？不需要改了？

responses.text: Perfect—everything looks good. Thanks for your help!
responses.text_cn: 完美，都很好，谢谢你帮忙！

responses.text: Actually, can you add the Q3 forecast slide? Just one more.
responses.text_cn: 对了，能加个Q3预测页吗？就一个。

responses.text: All clear.
responses.text_cn: 没问题了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用‘all clear’简洁收尾，适合确认型对话
